base

Title:
Base - variables with that are easiest to access

Kind of global variables (depending if this is imported)

ALLEGRO_FONT*[] g_fonts;
Array of fonts

enum g_PrintFatness;
Font thickness setting

enum g_MediaType;
Type of media, (input word, ref word)

string g_emptyText;
Empty string

immutable string g_voicesFolder;
Alphabet letter sounds folder

immutable string g_devide;
reference word devider
